title: HENDRY MICRO, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE STUD, SILVER
description:
Set with a bar accent, the Hendry micro is the classic stud 2.0. Crafted in sterling silver with rhodium-coated 14-karat gold posts. Choose up to 6 sizes for a graduated ear.
Before Purchasing:
Please note that this stud is sold as a single stud, and not as a pair. To purchase a pair, add a quantity of two to your cart.
